name: Personalized Medicine
description: Clinical medicine is making rapid progress in predicting individual patients’ disease risk, prevention, diagnosis and treatment. This new health care delivery requires overcoming major science and policy challenges to pave the way for its navigation by professionals and patients. Focus is on the significance of current breakthrough applications (e.g., nanoscale DNA sequencing).
prerequisites: 14 FCE complete, HMB302H1/ HMB312H1/ HMB314H1/ HMB322H1
